name: Metric
title: Google
Cloud
Logging
Metric
description:
Metric

A logs-based Google Cloud Monitoring metric. A metric is a measured value that can be used to assess a system. The basis of a logs-based metric is the collection of log entries that match a logs filter.

methods.name: name
title: Google
Cloud
Logging
Metric#name
methods.description: The client-assigned metric identifier. Metric identifiers are limited to 1000 characters and can include only the following characters: A-Z, a-z, 0-9, and the special characters _-.,+!*',()%/\. The forward-slash character (/) denotes a hierarchy of name pieces, and it cannot be the first character of the name.

methods.name: description
title: Google
Cloud
Logging
Metric#description
methods.description: The description of this metric, which is used in documentation.

methods.name: description=
title: Google
Cloud
Logging
Metric#description=
methods.description: Updates the description of this metric, which is used in documentation.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud/logging"

logging = Google::Cloud::Logging.new
metric = logging.metric "severe_errors"
metric.filter = "logName:syslog AND severity>=ERROR"
metric.save

methods.name: reload!
title: Google
Cloud
Logging
Metric#reload!
methods.description: Reloads the logs-based metric with current data from the Logging service.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud/logging"

logging = Google::Cloud::Logging.new
metric = logging.metric "severe_errors"
metric.filter = "Unwanted value"
metric.reload!
metric.filter #=> "logName:syslog"

require "google/cloud/logging"

logging = Google::Cloud::Logging.new
metric = logging.metric "severe_errors"
metric.delete

returns.description: Returns true if the metric was deleted.
